plot outline: Ajeya is a 1985 Indian Kannada film, directed by Siddalingaiah and Produced by Siddalingaiah and S D Murali. The film stars Murali, Sandhya, Leelavathi, Ashalatha, Anuradha, Vijayakashi and Doddanna in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ilayaraaja.
title: Ajeya
plot: _Ajeya_ (qv) is a 1985 Indian Kannada film, directed by Siddalingaiah and Produced by Siddalingaiah and S D Murali. The film stars Murali, Sandhya, Leelavathi, Ashalatha, Anuradha, Vijayakashi and Doddanna in lead roles. The music of the film was composed by Ilayaraaja.
